Markdown is able to show different types of text: 

- *italics*
- **bold**
- `code`
- [links] (http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com)
- etc. 

But you could also create 

- Latex equations, $E = mc^{2}$
- bibliographies [@rmarkdown15]

# Reference
- JJ. Allaire, et. al. 2015. "R Markdown" rmarkdown.rstudio.com

# Other formats

- Headers, Lists, Links, Images, Footnotes
